alert.note: Alert for Pennington Co Plains; Rapid City (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 30 at 2:33PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Pennington County through 315 PM MDT... At 233 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Hart Ranch, or 6 miles south of Rapid City, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Rapid City, southern Rapid Valley, Caputa, Rapid City Airport, Bear Country, Hart Ranch, Black Gap, Reptile Gardens and Thompson Butte. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
